-- Megatron --

Megatron snarled as he was hit by the blast, which was absorbed by 
his chest armour. That blast being the first damamge in the fight. 
He replied by reversing his axe swing, and bringing it back up the 
reverse direction of the way he'd just swung.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> He pushed the attack down with his left arm bearing down on the 
axe pushing 
> it away his right arm shot forard and firdd and energy blast while 
his tail 
> slapped Megatron's dragon arm away.
